title.title: BALI BIRD PARK AND UBUD TOUR
title.text: BALI BIRD PARK AND UBUD TOUR
title.html: BALI BIRD PARK AND UBUD TOUR

tagline.title: BALI BIRD PARK AND UBUD TOUR IS TO ENJOY VISITING HOME OF HUNDRED KIND OF BIRD AT BALI BIRD PARK AND CONTINUE VISITING UBUD TOURISM SITE
tagline.text: BALI BIRD PARK AND UBUD TOUR IS TO ENJOY VISITING HOME OF HUNDRED KIND OF BIRD AT BALI BIRD PARK AND CONTINUE VISITING UBUD TOURISM SITE
tagline.html: BALI BIRD PARK AND UBUD TOUR IS TO ENJOY VISITING HOME OF HUNDRED KIND OF BIRD AT BALI BIRD PARK AND CONTINUE VISITING UBUD TOURISM SITE

description.text: Bali Bird Park and Ubud Tour is a Bali Combination Tour packages to visit Bali Bird Park with hundred kind of bird and visiting ubud know as a culture village. Is a one day tour that combines to visit a bird park with all the beauty of birds from around the world here and continue to visit tourist objects located in the center of Ubud. The first thing we visited was the Bali Bird Park which is located not far from Ubud, here we will explore what is in Bali Bird Park with all the beauty of birds of various types and also bird shows here,almost 1000 birds of 250 different species can be seen here at Bali Bird Park, followed by heading to the restaurant to enjoy lunch with Indonesian food, after lunch, the journey continued to visiting Ubud Monkey Forest with the beauty of tropical forests around here. and also the very tame monkeys here, continue to visit ubud palace which is the ancient palace of ubud and visit the ubud market to see handicrafts and souvenirs sold here, after that we will take you back to the hotel with a memorable experience on the Bali Bird tour Park and Ubud Tour, accompanied by a very friendly and experienced driver will make this combination tour very enjoyable

title.title: Bali Bird Park | Bali Bird Park and Ubud Tour

image.title: Bali Bird Park | Bali Bird Park and Ubud Tour

description.text: Find yourself at the Bali Bird Park to witness the largest and finest collection of Indonesian birds in the world plus fantastic birds from Africa & South America. Bali Bird Park Encompassing two hectares of botanical landscape, the park provides sanctuary to almost 1000 birds of 250 different species. Bali Bird Park accommodates an amazing display of flora with more then 2000 tropical plants including 50 varieties of palms alone and attracting numerous butterflies. Incorporating a breeding, research and veterinary facility within the complex, the park has a high success rate in the captive reproduction of exotic birds such as the Bird. of Paradise and Hornbill. Feel this excitement get closed with Birds from many kind species at Bali Bird Park and make this holiday is memorable one for you and family.

title.title: Bali Ubud Monkey Forest | Bali Bird Park and Ubud Tour

image.title: Bali Bird Park and Ubud Tour | Bali Ubud Monkey Forest | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Ubud Monkey Forest is a small rain forest dwelt by some group of monkeys and other tropical animals. It is strategically located in the hearth of Ubud Village. Monkey Forests in Balinese language called Wanara Wana are spread out in the island and Ubud Monkey Forest it self own very important function of the continuity the monkey habitat in Bali. Meanwhile the local community own important role to keep this forest naturally in order to all wild animals able to live smoothly. This monkey forest is close to other places of interest in Ubud like Ubud Palace, Ubud Art Market, Tegalalang Rice Terrace, Painting Museum and Goa Gajah. Ubud Monkey Forest is a small rain forest dwelt by some group of monkeys.

title.title: Bali Ubud Royal Palace | Bali Bird Park and Ubud Tour

image.title: Bali Bird Park and Ubud Tour | Bali Ubud Royal Palace | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Ubud Royal Palace is the residential house of Ubud king which is more known by the name of Puri Saren. Ubud palace is an artistic cultural life center, while the traditional market is the symbol of local economics resident. The existence of Ubud palace as a palace is equipped by a Wantilan/auditorium that is a large building of meeting room and a banyan tree as shelter place at the daytime. In this palace, the Ubud king is leaving with his family and makes this palace as governance center in the empire era. The houses are very beautiful with the strong Balinese ornaments and decorations that make it an ideal place to visit.

title.title: Ubud Art Market | Bali ATV Ride and Ubud Tour

image.title: Ubud Art Market | Bali ATV Ride and Ubud Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ubud art market is an art market located in the center of Ubud, and is located in front of the Ubud Palace, the function of this Ubud market is as a shopping center for the local community where they carry out transactions for purchasing staple foods, and because many tourists visit this market. , so here now there are many shops selling souvenir knick-knacks and handicrafts for tourists who visit here, this ubud market is never deserted by tourists who want to see the uniqueness of this ubud market market or just buy souvenirs

price.title: Bali Bird Park and Ubud Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Bird Park and Ubud Tour Price :

  • Adult : IDR 900.000/pax
  • Children ( 2 – 12 yrs) : IDR 750.000
  • Infant : under 2 years of age are free of charge

Note :
Rates are quoted per person for minimum of 2 person
Get special price for group booking

Bali Bird Park and Ubud Tour Price Include :

  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Private A/C Car
  • 3 Hours in Bali Bird Park
  • Indonesian Lunch
  • Entrance Ticket

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
